survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hello
awesome! i'm at the starting point and i can see a twig to the left leading to a small island with a tiger on it
which way do i go next?
butterfly
alrighty, so i head towards the southeast from the tiger to the island with the butterfly, yeah?
ok
okay, i'm on the butterfly island now
where to next?
tiger
back to the tiger, it is then! i'm there now
what's my next move?
frog
groovy! so, i'll go southeast from the parrot and follow the 3 rocks to frog island
i'm there now, what should i do next?
bird
i think there might be a mix up, i don't see a bird on the map, do you mean the parrot or is there another bird i'm missing?
parrot
got it! heading back to the parrot on the big island now! i'm there, what's the next move, boss?
frog
back to frog island! i'm hopping along there now i'm there now, should i go to the crocodile or somewhere else?
crocodile
oh boy, off to meet the crocodile
i'm now on the crocodile's side of the map, what's next?
jirafa
aight, heading west from the elephant to the giraffe then! i'm there, where do i go next?
snake
alrighty, a little trip southeast to the snake then! okay, i'm slithering with the snake now, where's my next stop?
box
assuming box means the treasure, i'm taking two steps east from the snake gotcha, i've reached the treasure *finished*

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hello
awesome! let's start our little adventure. firstly, see that wooden bench next to you? take a small walk towards it, and cross a trail aimed at the florist stand
just when you're about to reach, make a cheeky u-turn back towards our cute, white fluffy friend. what're you waiting for? let's set off!
ok
fantastic! now, cross over the branch
head south like you're chasing the sunshine. spot another white dog chilling with a picnic? great job!
thank you
you're doing great! now, rove over that picnic mat, give those yummy berries a high five and continue to your left
ready? let's move!
ok
brilliant mate! up's the way now
see that wooden branch over our river? time to cross it! let's go north!
ok
great job! now avoid the bush, it's a bit prickly
skirt around it to the right until you reach the florist stand. off you go!
done
wow, you're a natural at this
now turn left, pass the florist stand, heading towards that big ol' bridge. can you see the cyclists there? that's where you're heading
done
nice one! can you spot a quaint scene – two lovely oldies enjoying their newspapers just past the bridge? walk towards them, friend!
yes
good job, buddy! now, let's take a small stroll southwards, right between our elderly friends and that wooden branch
look at that! a green bush by the end of the branch. head there!
yes
you're nearly there, mate! spread some love eastwards now
make your way between the branch and the bush
done
great! now keep going east for a little while
done
fantastic! spot young bambi over there? head over to our adorable brown deer
well done! you've reached the end!

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
hi
awesome! we're starting at a tent, north of the map
there's a dog and fire nearby, a mushroom and a blue car even further south, and then a telescope and house further down. how should we start?
dog
cool! i see the dog sitting to the left of the fire
where to next?
fire
alright, i'm now by the fire
what's the next move?
then car
got it! i'm standing right next to the blue car now
where should i head to next?
microscop
alrighty! i'm at the blue telescope now
where to next, boss?
then house
done deal! i've reached the wooden house surrounded by rocks
*finished* thanks, pal! this was fun! what's next?

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
hi
awesome! start by heading under the first palm tree to your south-west
after that, make a right and cross the second palm tree. then, whip a sharp left before you hit the third tree, and keep going south
done
good job! now find the cute, brown puppy and gently curve to its left
then make a swift right and continue heading south
done
nice move! up next, you'll see a big rock on your left and a small rock on your right
go right through the middle. a surprise awaits!
ok
cool! now step into the water. yes, do it! you should see a large red crab
don't worry, he's friendly.
ok
right after meeting our crab friend, turn right and keep going west alongside the big rock
keep your toes wet!
ok
great going! after passing a medium rock in the water, watch out for a shark
yeah, i said shark!
yes
sharp right at the shark's nose
it shouldn't be too close i promise!
ok
back on land, there's a fun-looking bouncy ball and that medium rock we passed before
done
slip between them and proceed north for a bit
yes
fab! now veer slightly to your left and head toward the north-west
done
unexpected obstacle ahead, a shiny red tent! but don't worry, we got this
yes
navigate between the tent on your left and a big speaker on your right
keep moving!
ok
great! now go around the tent, like you're drawing a half circle around it from right to left
yes
lovely! continue south towards the sea, but don't go swimming again just yet!
ok
just before your toes touch the water, turn right and walk under the red kayak
watch your head!
done
proud of you! now turn sharp right, walk along the kayak till you meet a little green bush!
